name: Intergalactic Wizard Force (LOCATS TEAM)
description:
We are the LOCATS team. Welcome to the work done by your new LO-CAT-LIZATION Lords and Masters (at your service). 

We're translators looking to dive into localization. For many of us, this is out first LocJam.

We aimed to make a translation that could be enjoyed by all Spanish speakers.

Logo: yawnmeow
